<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a></>}>
An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> together with an associated mutex that can be used to lock the context to prevent concurrent access by other threads. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

An LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> together with a shared <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a1bba70015bd06fc62083890136957dda"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5238e1d80536030a7ddd0a00e18c7371">ThreadSafeModule</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a1bba70015bd06fc62083890136957dda">operator=</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5238e1d80536030a7ddd0a00e18c7371">ThreadSafeModule</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to explicitly define this move operator to copy the fields in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reverse order (i.e. module first) to ensure the dependencies are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// protected: The old module that is being overwritten must be destroyed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;before&#42; the context that it depends on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also need to lock the context to make sure the module tear-down</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not overlap any other work on the context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">      M = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    M = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.M);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a ThreadSafeModule from a unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; and an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// existing ThreadSafeContext.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aad76bc6379e9faa0a0b2e360817bbc37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aad76bc6379e9faa0a0b2e360817bbc37">ThreadSafeModule</a>(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a> TSCtx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : M(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(M)), TSCtx(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(TSCtx)) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a39fded867bd4a9aa23197880a2523bdb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a39fded867bd4a9aa23197880a2523bdb">~ThreadSafeModule</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to lock the context while we destruct the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> L = TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a25f49da8596355b9e4d0f2f85b792854">getLock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      M = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Boolean conversion: This ThreadSafeModule will evaluate to true if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// wraps a non-null module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#ad047604d783d265d6f5a5cfc3f0345e3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">operator</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bool()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a26cd7d5082cf17b4782dc90afbc37899">getContext</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Non-null module must have non-null context&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Locks the associated ThreadSafeContext and calls the given function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// on the contained Module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5dc53e9bbda9066a1ade839494fe0cd9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Func&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5dc53e9bbda9066a1ade839494fe0cd9">withModuleDo</a>(Func &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(M &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can not call on null module&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lock = TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a25f49da8596355b9e4d0f2f85b792854">getLock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>(&#42;M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Locks the associated ThreadSafeContext and calls the given function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// on the contained Module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aa62be2ea900c7dbd8c0d45af767142c5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Func&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aa62be2ea900c7dbd8c0d45af767142c5">withModuleDo</a>(Func &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(M &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can not call on null module&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lock = TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a25f49da8596355b9e4d0f2f85b792854">getLock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>(&#42;M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Locks the associated ThreadSafeContext and calls the given function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// passing the contained std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt;. The given function should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// consume the Module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a0f1e21cac5addd85d48c5e4819d31df7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Func&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a0f1e21cac5addd85d48c5e4819d31df7">consumingModuleDo</a>(Func &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lock = TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a25f49da8596355b9e4d0f2f85b792854">getLock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>(std::move(M));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get a raw pointer to the contained module without locking the context.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get a raw pointer to the contained module without locking the context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#ab9654d98cd18ba8401ea64b4b082b4fe"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#ab9654d98cd18ba8401ea64b4b082b4fe">getModuleUnlocked</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M.get(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the context for this ThreadSafeModule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a005c94184fdf73cdac56be7b8f17fc12"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a005c94184fdf73cdac56be7b8f17fc12">getContext</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TSCtx; &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a> TSCtx;</span></CodeLine>
